description: Comprehensive Mermaid configuration with latest features for Uptime-Watcher project
fontFamily: CodeNewRoman Nerd Font Mono, MesloLGS Nerd Font, SauceCodePro NFM, ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, 'SF Mono', Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

gantt.fontFamily: CodeNewRoman Nerd Font Mono, MesloLGS Nerd Font, SauceCodePro NFM, ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, 'SF Mono', Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

themeCSS: .node rect { stroke-width: 2px; stroke-dasharray: none; } .edgeLabel { background-color: var(--mermaid-edge-label-background); border-radius: 3px; padding: 2px 4px; } .cluster rect { stroke-width: 1.5px; stroke-dasharray: 3,3; opacity: 0.8; } .flowchart-link { stroke-width: 2px; } .section { stroke-width: 1px; stroke-dasharray: 2,2; opacity: 0.9; }

timeline.fontFamily: CodeNewRoman Nerd Font Mono, MesloLGS Nerd Font, SauceCodePro NFM, ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, 'SF Mono', Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace
